text: Blackball is a 2003 British movie based on the game of bowls. It was written by Tim Firth, and the was directed by Mel Smith. The film follows Paul Kaye who is talented at the game, but comes from a working class family. He is teamed up with James Cromwell an upper class player to compete against Australia. The plot is based on the bowls player Griff Sanders, who was called "the Bad Boy of Bowls". ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Bowls Category:2000s movies
